meta.description: Optimize the cost of pills to meet daily medicine requirements for Z1 and D3.

params.name: content
params.description: Grams of each medicine per pill type.

params.name: requirement
params.description: Daily requirement of each medicine in grams.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of pills to take of each type.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[p] * x[p] for p in PILLS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of pills.

constraints.name: z1_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(content[p]['Z1'] * x[p] for p in PILLS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 5 grams of Z1 are taken.

constraints.name: d3_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(content[p]['D3'] * x[p] for p in PILLS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 10 grams of D3 are taken.
